DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to establish the safety, tolerability, and efficacy of Vytorin (R) (Ezetimibe + Simvastatin) (SCH 465981) on a select population of Filipinos with hypercholesterolemia.
DOC.brief_title: Post-marketing Surveillance of the Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy of Vytorin (Ezetimibe + Simvastatin) Tablet Among Filipino Patients (Study P05647)
DOC.criteria: Outpatient men or women, age 18 years and above Patients with primary (heterozygous familial and nonfamilial) hypercholesterolemia Known hypersensitivity to Ezetimibe and Simvastatin Moderate to severe hepatic insufficiency Persistent elevation of serum transaminase levels of more than 1.5 times the upper limit of normal Pregnancy or lactation Concomitant intake of bile acid sequestrants (resins), nicotinic acid (niacin), fibric acid (fibrates), or cyclosporine
